column4: hi, can some tell me why after installation grub just ends up with error 17 please?
I have a swap partition (hda1) and / - ext3 (hda2), nothing else
looks like your grub config is messed up, can you boot from a live CD and post it
ah nice, way ahead of me then :)
is your bios maybe a bit old
I had no problems with older distributions ...
try setting the partition type with cfdisk
do you have a e2fs_stage1_5 in /boot/gtub?
damn, that was my last idea :(
whereby /chroot is my ubuntu mount point, right?
how can I access host's /dev/ devices in chroot? I have access denied to all /chroot/dev devices ...
